attributes.action: Place a Salary cap on MP's to help inflation and show that they are in touch with the Working Class
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A new serving Police Officer joins on just over £21,000 per year, yet Recent Reports claim MP's have requested a 15% payrise taking their pay to £75000.00 per year, this is not acceptable in our struggling climate. If back pay cannot be offered to Police Officers, but Tanker Drivers can go on strike for their rights, then surely MP's have a duty not to request extra pay increases for at least 2 Years.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
